books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A military investigator uncovers a conspiracy.
books.name: ZERO DAY

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A historic hotel in Boonsboro, Md., has endured war and peace, changing hands, even rumors of hauntings. Now it’s getting a face-lift from the Montgomery brothers and their eccentric mother.
books.name: THE NEXT ALWAYS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Partners in a small law firm take on a big case after a fast-track burnout joins them.
books.name: THE LITIGATORS

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man and woman who have gone their separate ways return to their Southern town for the funeral of a friend.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Surrounded by fascinating guests, a woman grows up in the luxury hotel her father founded.
books.name: HOTEL VENDOME

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: In three never-before-collected stories, the Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch confronts difficult cases.
books.name: ANGLE OF INVESTIGATION

books.author: by James Patterson and Richard DiLallo
books.description: A widow keeps the identity of the new man she is about to marry a secret as her children gather for Christmas.
books.name: THE CHRISTMAS WEDDING

books.author: by Sherrilyn Kenyon
books.description: Lydia, a Dream-Hunter guarding Olympus, descends into the Nether Realm and locks horns with the tortured son of an Egyptian god.
books.name: THE GUARDIAN

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: A woman who has been in love with her boss, a handsome veterinarian, for a year, finally kisses him under the mistletoe.
books.name: ONLY US

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Former high school sweethearts, separated after a mutually hurtful incident, fall tentatively back into each other’s orbits after more than a decade.
books.name: UNFINISHED BUSINESS

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: For Jack Reacher, an elite military police officer, it all started in 1997. A lonely railroad track. A crime scene. A cover-up.
books.name: THE AFFAIR

books.author: by Richard Paul Evans
books.description: A prodigal son turns his life around during the holiday season.
books.name: LOST DECEMBER

books.author: by Jeffrey Eugenides
books.description: Three Brown graduates in the early 1980s wrestle with love, religion and coming of age.
books.name: THE MARRIAGE PLOT

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers investigates bombings directed against a superstore chain seeking to open a store in a Minnesota river town.
books.name: SHOCK WAVE
